title: Weird game lag
body: When I play league I get weird lag sometimes. My ping will be sitting at 27, and my fps is always 60. There's no indication that I'm lagging. However, in game I'll be playing and sometimes it feels like a slide show, not as bad to that extend at all. Just a champion will appear later on my screen than I know they should have or a hiccup sorta thing. Enough to make a big difference in kiting/skill shots. Anyone with the same experience?

replies.body:
From reading about your issue, my instincts tell me that you might be experiencing packet loss on your connection.  To get to the bottom of this, make sure to use our[ Connection Analyzer Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader)!  Running it will give you a healthcheck of your connection to League and let you know some troubleshooting steps if it finds any issues!

Let me know if none of those steps help out at all!
Thank you, I'll look into this.

I've experienced this exact same issue before, are you using wifi or a wired connection?

If you are using a wifi connection, something is most likely interfering with it.

Either way their is definitely some packet loss occurring.
